'''Redbill Pelican''' is a [[Wildlife]] found in [[Chenyu Vale]], [[Liyue]].

They can also be caught by the [[Omni-Ubiquity Net]].

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|2}}

Capturing or killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Many Redbill Pelicans can be found in the body of water between [[Qiaoying Village]] and [[Teatree Slope]].
<gallery>
Wildlife Redbill Pelican Map Location 1.png
</gallery>

See the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=568 Official Interactive Map] for specific locations.
